eventName: Kickstart Your AI Journey: Google Gen AI Study Jams Info Session

about: Information session for Google Gen AI Study Jams to kickstart your journey in AI.

faqs.question: Who can attend?
faqs.answer: Anyone from RVU interested in AI can attend.

perks: Learn about Google Gen AI tools
Chance to learn & use Google Cloud services for free
Guidance on starting an AI journey

eventName: Tech Winter Break + GDG On Campus RV University (BrainBits Quiz Series 1st Quiz)
about: First quiz in the BrainBits series during the tech winter break with GDG on Campus.
speaker: Dhanush S Gowda

faqs.question: Who can participate?
faqs.answer: All RVU students are welcome to join.

faqs.question: What is the format of the quiz?
faqs.answer: It will be a tech-based quiz with multiple-choice questions hosted live.

about: Participate in the Solutions Challenge 2025 to solve real-world problems using technology.

faqs.question: Who can join?
faqs.answer: RVU students passionate about solving real-world issues.

faqs.question: What kind of projects are expected?
faqs.answer: Innovative tech solutions addressing global challenges.

about: A session to guide students on building AI projects and preparing for Google Summer of Code.
speaker: Sunainha Vijay, Vidhvath J Poojari

faqs.question: Who should attend?
faqs.answer: Students interested in open-source and GSoC.

faqs.question: What will be covered?
faqs.answer: Tips on crafting proposals and contributing to open-source projects.

about: Official announcement of the CodeVerse Leetcode community at RV University. And qualifier rounds for the CodeVerse Leetcode community competition.
speaker: Dyuthi Ramesh, Sri Krishna R Hebbar

faqs.question: What is CodeVerse?
faqs.answer: A coding community under GDG RVU focused on competitive programming.

faqs.question: Who can join?
faqs.answer: Any RVU student interested in coding challenges.

eventName: Build with AI: Student Innovations for Real-World Impact
about: A session focused on student innovations in AI to address real-world challenges.
speaker: Dyuthi Ramesh, Bommireddy C Nishant Reddy, Saatvik B H, Karmishtha Patnaik, Vipul Arya, Prof. Manjul Gupta

faqs.question: Who should attend?
faqs.answer: Students interested in AI and innovation.

faqs.question: What is the focus of the event?
faqs.answer: Developing AI solutions for real-world problems.
